plugins.name: Switch Auto Layout Direction
plugins.description:
Switch AL direction: bind to a shortcut for quick layout work


Switch the direction of Auto Layout from Vertical to Horizontal or vice versa while preserving the Fill and Hug settings for both the parent frame and its children. No unexpected surprises with broken layouts when changing the direction!


The plugin works on all auto-layout frames that you select.
plugins.tagline: Switch AL direction: bind to a shortcut for quick layout work

98187.name: Switch Auto Layout Direction
98187.description:

The plugin works on all auto-layout frames that you select.
98187.tagline: Switch AL direction: bind to a shortcut for quick layout work

plugins.name: Winding Rule Inspector
plugins.description:
Warning: If you don't know what Winding Rules are, you probably don't need this plugin.


If you want to know more about winding rules, follow this link: https://oreillymedia.github.io/Using_SVG/extras/ch06-fill-rule.html


This plugin allows designers to quickly inspect the winding rule of vector objects in Figma. It provides instant feedback about the selected vector's winding rule, helping you understand and manage the rendering behavior of complex vector shapes.


Key features:

- Automatically displays the winding rule of the selected vector object

- Updates in real-time as you select different vector objects

- Provides clear notifications for non-vector selections or when no object is selected

- Runs unobtrusively in the background, allowing you to continue your design work


How to use:

1. Run the plugin

2. Select any vector object in your Figma design

3. A notification will appear showing the winding rule of the selected vector

4. As you select different vector objects, the notification will update automatically


This tool is perfect for designers working with complex vector illustrations, icons, or any projects where precise control over vector rendering is crucial. Understanding the winding rule can help resolve unexpected rendering issues and ensure your vectors display correctly across different platforms and use cases.


Note: This plugin only works with vector objects. Selecting any other type of object will result in a notification indicating that the selected object is not a vector.

accepted.name: Thierry
accepted.description: I am Thierry – a designer, developer, and, typographer based New York. I’ve worked with companies large and small, building and maintaining design systems.

plugins.tagline: This plugin allows designers to quickly inspect the winding rule of vector objects in Figma.

plugins.name: A11y Helper - Test for Accessibility
plugins.description:
This plugin aims to help UX/UI designers integrate accessibility awareness and thoughtful design throughout their workflows.


Test elements of your design with integrated colour-blindness simulation, contrast, text size, hierarchy and ALT-text checkers.


I'll be adding to the plugin over the next few months, with features such as,

  1. Automated fixes such as quick text colour adjustment to meet contrast requirements, and colour suggestions
  2. Batch processing & (hopefully) accessibility report generation
plugins.tagline: Make accessibility a priority at every step.

127447.description:

  2. Batch processing & (hopefully) accessibility report generation
127447.release_notes: Fixed the issue where framed text that has a background fill would be misinterpreted as text on white background.
127447.tagline: Make accessibility a priority at every step.

plugins.name: Export SVG to Power BI by ventriloc
plugins.description: Export SVG to Power BI by ventriloc streamlines the process of integrating custom SVG's visuals into Power BI. Instead of manually recreating designs, simply export your Figma frame as an SVG, paste it into a Power BI measure, and tweak the code to incorporate dynamic elements like measures and variables. This tool is perfect for designers and analysts who want full creative control over their Power BI visuals without the hassle of complex coding. Want to see more of what ventriloc can do? Visit our website ventriloc.ca !
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly export Figma frames to Power BI as editable SVGs for dynamic, custom visuals.

plugins.name: Contrast Checker
plugins.description:
Evaluate the contrast in your UI design according to the Contrast Success Criteria 1.4.3 and 1.4.6 of the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG).


Key Features:

  1. Instant Contrast Analysis: Quickly verify the contrast ratio between any text or element and its background for web accessibility.
  2. Accessibility Compliance: Ensure your designs are accessible to all users by meeting WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) standards.
  3. Intuitive Interface: Designed for simplicity and efficiency, providing a seamless workflow.


Why Choose Finlayer AI's Contrast Checker?

  1. Completely Free: No cost, perfect for freelancers, agencies, and in-house teams alike.
  2. Enhances Accessibility: Helps you design inclusive, ADA-compliant experiences for all users.
plugins.tagline: Turn high-quality designs into engaging and user-centric mobile experiences

plugins.name: Aiden HX - Figma to App
plugins.description:
Aiden HX is an innovative suite of AI-driven tools and frameworks designed to enhance the human experience of digital interactions.


Aiden HX for Figma, features a plugin that empowers developers by dramatically accelerating the conversion of Figma design assets into target technologies.


With this plugin, designs can be:

•Seamlessly transformed

•Directly deployed into enterprise platforms like Unqork,

•Converted into target not just the visual layout, but also all the essential UI controls and stylesheets


The key benefits are:

•Eliminates the traditional, time-consuming development process

•Allows teams to move faster from concept to production


Looking ahead, Aiden HX plans to expand its capabilities by supporting additional target technologies, including leading low-code platforms, Angular, and React.


This evolving roadmap ensures that the Aiden HX suite remains at the forefront of digital experience design, providing flexibility and agility to adapt to the rapidly changing technological landscape. Discover how Aiden AI can benefit your business at https://aidenai.com/


To know more about the our aiDAP (Digital Transformation platform) and our other offerings, please visit https://aidenai.com/#/services#platform


Contact us at https://aidenai.com/#/contact or info@aidenai.com
plugins.tagline: AI driven transformation of user experience designs on Figma to digital apps.

plugins.name: Oz Words
plugins.description:
Introducing Oz Words, the powerful content design plugin for Figma that streamlines your workflow and simplifies your development process.


How to use


  1. Rename the layer's name of your text by starting with "#t." and then follow with words. For example, "#t.back" or "#t.page_a.title"
  2. Open Oz Words Plugin, go to the library of the language you want to edit
  3. Look for the word you want to edit in code, edit and click save
  4. After saving, your text will update automatically


Note

This is our Beta version to test our concept. Please follow us for more updates. We are working on a simpler and user-friendly version and hope it will come out soon. Cheers!
plugins.tagline: With Oz Words, you can create text as components that can be edited and updated with just one click.

48740.name: Oz Words
48740.description:

plugins.name: Pinner
plugins.description:
JULY 2025 PROMOTION

Unlimited Unlock $3 after Trial (Save $5.00)

--------------------------------------------------------


Seamlessly import your Pinterest boards in Figma


  1. Secret boards supported
  2. Fast and customizable import
  3. Imports highest-res images available
  4. Supports large boards with 500+ pins
  5. Imports pins as an AutoLayout grid
  6. One-time unlock for unlimited imports
plugins.tagline: Seamless import your Pinterest boards into Figma

131547.name: Pinner
131547.description:
JULY 2025 PROMOTION

Unlimited Unlock $3 after Trial (Save $5.00)

--------------------------------------------------------


Seamlessly import your Pinterest boards in Figma


  1. Secret boards supported
  2. Fast and customizable import
  3. Imports highest-res images available
  4. Supports large boards with 500+ pins
  5. Imports pins as an AutoLayout grid
  6. One-time unlock for unlimited imports
131547.release_notes:
Import Settings
------------------------------------
New options allow for custom pin dimensions or automatic framing based on the exact dimensions of original Pinterest pin images.

Persistent Authorization
------------------------------------
The plugin now retains your Pinterest authorization between sessions, so you no longer need to reauthorize each time.

Pinterest Account Management
------------------------------------
You can now unlink your Pinterest account from the plugin, making it easier to switch between multiple accounts as needed.

Additional Improvements
------------------------------------
The interface has been reorganized with separate tabs for Boards and Import Settings to improve usability. Clearer status messages offer better feedback during the import process. Authorization errors and expired tokens are now handled more gracefully with automatic recovery.
131547.tagline: Seamless import your Pinterest boards into Figma

plugins.name: Obra Icons
plugins.description:
The Obra Icons plugin features:


  1. 1000+ icons: this set has an icon for everything you need. We specifically chose the icons to work well in user interfaces.
  2. 3 weights: every icon can be added to your designs in 3 different weights, with stroke widths of 2px, 1.5px and 1px
  3. Sizes: Set your icons in different sizes, from the smallest size at 12 by 12 pixels to 64 by 64 pixels.
  4. Change colours: Ability to change the color of pasted icons, even to save your own custom colors to the plugin
  5. Keyword search: search icons not just by their name, but also by extensive extra keywords, to make it easier to find what you are looking for


View all Obra icons on the web via our website icons.obra.studio.

accepted.name: Obra Studio
accepted.description: Obra Studio helps software companies get to the next design level

plugins.tagline: The official Obra Icons Figma plugin

plugins.name: Quick Rename
plugins.description:
Automatically renames frames and components in Figma based on their auto-layout properties. It helps designers maintain consistent and meaningful layer naming conventions, making it easier to understand the structure and purpose of elements in complex designs.


Key features


  1. Renames frames with auto-layout to "Column", "Row", or "Wrap" based on their layout mode
  2. Labels frames without auto-layout as "Container"
  3. Identifies frames containing text as "Content"
  4. Rename all shapes as "Vector"
  5. Preserves naming for component instances
  6. Reset text layers names


Benefits


  1. Saves time on manual renaming
  2. Improves file organization and readability
  3. Enhances collaboration by providing clear visual hierarchy
  4. Helps maintain consistency across design systems
  5. Makes it easier to identify and update layout structures
plugins.tagline: Essential keyboard shortcut to rename layers

plugins.name: Set Min/Max size
plugins.description:
This plugin is designed to manage and modify the sizing constraints of selected elements within auto layout frames or elements that are themselves auto layout frames.


Functionality:

  1. Setting min/max width or height
  2. Setting both min and max width or height simultaneously
  3. Setting all dimensions (min/max width and height)
  4. Removing min/max width or height constraints
  5. Removing all constraints
plugins.tagline: Instantly set min & max dimensions to multiple items

94912.description:

  4. Removing min/max width or height constraints

plugins.name: Custom Table Generator
plugins.description:
Custom Table Generator is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you design complex, fully customizable tables—without importing JSON, CSV, or any external data.


Designed for designers who demand precision and flexibility, this plugin gives you a smooth UI for building table structures from scratch, component by component.


Key features:

🧱 Component-friendly: build using Figma components, variants, and auto layout


🔧 Drag-and-drop column and row control


🎨 Full styling options: borders, spacing, colors, typography, alignment


📐 Advanced layout support (nested cells, merged rows, sticky headers, etc.)
plugins.tagline: Build complex, beautiful tables—without touching code or data files.

127112.name: Custom Table Generator
127112.description:
Custom Table Generator is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you design complex, fully customizable tables—without importing JSON, CSV, or any external data.


Designed for designers who demand precision and flexibility, this plugin gives you a smooth UI for building table structures from scratch, component by component.


Key features:

🧱 Component-friendly: build using Figma components, variants, and auto layout


🔧 Drag-and-drop column and row control


🎨 Full styling options: borders, spacing, colors, typography, alignment


📐 Advanced layout support (nested cells, merged rows, sticky headers, etc.)
127112.tagline: Build complex, beautiful tables—without touching code or data files.

plugins.name: Dynamo
plugins.description:
Effortlessly increase design quality and accessibility


  1. Live preview Dynamic Type in real time
  2. Spot where text needs to wrap or truncate
  3. Add your scaled designs to the canvas with a click
  4. Saves you a ton of time


What's Dynamic Type?


Many users set a text size other than the default in order to read content more comfortably. Supporting Dynamic Type and larger text sizes is an important accessibility requirement. Dynamo scales text layers in your designs to test how they handle larger text sizes. Making it much easier to increase the quality, robustness, and inclusivity of your designs.


For best results


  1. Use auto layout in your designs so that layouts remain in tact once text layers have scaled
  2. To ignore a text layer, prepend its name with a period


Please leave comments and feedback below.

accepted.name: Mike
accepted.description:
Premium app design for startups.
Tools to level up designers.

plugins.tagline: Live Dynamic Type Preview

plugins.name: Figma to Celtra
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with the "Figma to Celtra" integration! Effortlessly import your stunning Figma designs into Celtra's design workspace and unlock the power of creative automation.


Key Features:

  1. Streamlined Workflow: Continue your pre-production processes and create conceptual designs in Figma, then drop them into Celtra with ease for a cohesive and efficient design experience.
  2. Efficient Importing: Easily transition your designs from Figma to Celtra using a simple copy and paste function. Whether you're working with single layers or multiple artboards, the process is quick and hassle-free.
  3. Layer Mapping: Experience seamless compatibility as all layer types from Figma are mapped to their corresponding layers in Celtra. Make configurations effortlessly for Images, Text, Shapes, and Groups right after you import.


Once your designs are in Celtra, take advantage of creative automation to scale your content across various sizes and design variations without missing a beat. Upgrade your design collaboration and scaling capabilities today by using "Figma to Celtra", and take the first step toward a more streamlined creative workflow.


Note that this plugin is compatible only with design files created in Celtra's Creative Automation platform.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Design Integration

131873.name: Figma to Celtra
131873.description:

  3. Layer Mapping: Experience seamless compatibility as all layer types from Figma are mapped to their corresponding layers in Celtra. Make configurations effortlessly for Images, Text, Shapes, and Groups right after you import.


Once your designs are in Celtra, take advantage of creative automation to scale your content across various sizes and design variations without missing a beat. Upgrade your design collaboration and scaling capabilities today by using "Figma to Celtra", and take the first step toward a more streamlined creative workflow.


Note that this plugin is compatible only with design files created in Celtra's Creative Automation platform.

plugins.name: Work/Space
plugins.description:
Work/Space is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the setup of your Figma page structure with just a button click. It also includes a built-in traffic light management feature for page organisation, as demonstrated in the GIF.


Having been a developer in my past life, I can empathise with their challenges. Uncertainty about what to expect, especially when they use Figma for the first time, can delay project delivery. The inspiration for this plugin came from numerous discussions with various development teams. I realised that:


1. Developers generally don't understand Atomic Design Systems.


2. The 'Ready for dev' feature in Figma, while beneficial, isn't the most efficient way to visually communicate readiness to developers.


3. Crucially, not all development teams have access to the infamous 'Dev Mode' (a questionable decision, Figma), particularly smaller agencies or teams with limited budgets.


The traffic light system is an effective project management tool. The page management feature in Work/Space subtly encourages conversations with developers to minimise communication gaps effectively.


To make the best use of the plugin, you can set your own page structure using the source code. Contact me for more details :)


For any issues, suggestions or feedback, please reach out to me on my email hi@sai.design.

accepted.name: Sai Maniganahalli
accepted.description: I'm a multi-disciplinary designer based in Australia :)

plugins.tagline: Minimise your project setup time using Work/Space

87959.name: Work/Space
87959.description:
Work/Space is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the setup of your Figma page structure with just a button click. It also includes a built-in traffic light management feature for page organisation, as demonstrated in the GIF.


Having been a developer in my past life, I can empathise with their challenges. Uncertainty about what to expect, especially when they use Figma for the first time, can delay project delivery. The inspiration for this plugin came from numerous discussions with various development teams. I realised that:


1. Developers generally don't understand Atomic Design Systems.


2. The 'Ready for dev' feature in Figma, while beneficial, isn't the most efficient way to visually communicate readiness to developers.


3. Crucially, not all development teams have access to the infamous 'Dev Mode' (a questionable decision, Figma), particularly smaller agencies or teams with limited budgets.


The traffic light system is an effective project management tool. The page management feature in Work/Space subtly encourages conversations with developers to minimise communication gaps effectively.


To make the best use of the plugin, you can set your own page structure using the source code. Contact me for more details :)


For any issues, suggestions or feedback, please reach out to me on my email hi@sai.design.

87959.tagline: Minimise your project setup time using Work/Space

plugins.name: Athlon TOC
plugins.description:
Navigate Your Figma Projects Like Never Before


A tool to streamline your design workflow. This powerful plugin automatically generates a detailed table of contents for your Figma files, making navigation through complex projects a breeze.


Features and Benefits:


Automatic Detection: The tool scans your Figma file and automatically identifies all sections and frames, organizing them into a clear, concise table of contents.


Clickable Links: Each entry in the table of contents is a clickable link, allowing you to jump directly to the relevant section or frame. No more scrolling through endless layers to find what you need!


Dynamic Updates: As your project evolves, rerunning the tool dynamically updates the table of contents to reflect changes, ensuring that you always have an up-to-date overview.


Vertical Auto-Layout: The table of contents is presented in a neatly organized vertical auto-layout frame, providing a clear and structured overview of your document.


Customizable Layout: While the tool takes care of the heavy lifting, you retain full control over the layout and presentation of your table of contents, ensuring it complements your design process.


Easy to Use:

Simply install the plugin, run it within your Figma file, and watch as it transforms your workflow, saving you time and effort.
plugins.tagline: Navigate with Ease: Instant Table of Contents for Your Figma Files

76257.name: Athlon TOC
76257.description:

plugins.name: x10 figma command line
plugins.description:
This plugin builds on top of Figma's native command line. Allowing you to conditionally select layers with in a page, Filter current selections through conditions, and set the properties of the current select layers.


x10 is designed to avoid having to learn a new command line language as much as possible. It uses natural way setting conditions and setting properties.



For documentation, Feature request or bug reports use my notion page!

plugins.name: GIFtastic
plugins.description:
🎬 GIFtastic - Turn Your Figma Frames Into Animated GIFs

Transform your Figma designs into captivating animated GIFs with just a few clicks! Perfect for showcasing UI interactions, creating marketing assets, or sharing design concepts.


✨ Key Features

  1. Smart & Simple
  2. Select frames and preview your animation in real-time
  3. Drag & drop to reorder frames
  4. One-click export with automatic downloads


Professional Quality

  1. 4 quality levels (64-256 colours)
  2. Multiple background options (transparent, white, black, or frame fill)
  3. Advanced dithering for smooth gradients
  4. Real-time file size preview


Complete Control

  1. Adjustable frame timing (0.05-5 seconds)
  2. Loop settings and playback controls
  3. Live preview with play/pause
  4. Memory-efficient processing


🚀 Perfect For

  1. UI/UX Designers: Showcase app interactions and user flows
  2. Marketing Teams: Create engaging social media content
  3. Product Teams: Demonstrate features and functionality
  4. Anyone: Who wants to make their designs move!


🎯 How It Works

  1. Select your frames in Figma
  2. Preview your animation with real-time playback
  3. Adjust quality, timing, and background settings
  4. Reorder frames by dragging if needed
  5. Export and download your GIF instantly


Ready to bring your designs to life? Install GIFtastic and start creating engaging animated stories from your Figma frames!
plugins.tagline: Transform your Figma designs into captivating animated GIFs with just a few clicks!

plugins.name: Knapsack
plugins.description:
Export Figma Vars in a format that can be imported into a Knapsack Workspace as Design Tokens and CSS. Collections & Modes are preserved and allow many theming possibilities in your design system's coded components.


  1. An existing Knapsack workspace is required
  2. Currently only export from Figma Vars to Knapsack Design Tokens is supported - with the other direction coming in a future update


For support, reach out to help at knapsack dot cloud

plugins.name: deeepSpace
plugins.description:
deeepSpace Plugin (Beta) – Bring Your Design System to Life 🚀


Transform your design systems into scalable, production-ready code with the deeepSpace Figma Plugin (Beta). Designed for creators and builders who prioritize scalability, efficiency, and speed, deeepSpace makes it effortless to bridge the gap between design and development without unnecessary complexity.


What Makes deeepSpace Awesome?


🚀 Unmatched Speed: Push your design system to deeepSpace in just seconds. It’s so fast, you’ll wonder how you worked without it!


💡 Design-System-First: Forget bulky page-level exports. We focus exclusively on your design system to ensure your components are scalable, reusable, and developer-ready.


🛠️ Developer-Centric Code: No messy, bloated output – just clean, structured code that your dev team will love. Minimal edits required!


📦 Complete Workflow Integration: From the Figma Plugin to the deeepCLI and web interface, our tools work together seamlessly to keep your projects and design systems organized.


Beta Features:


This is our beta version, and we’re constantly improving! Try it now and help us shape the future of design-to-code workflows. Your feedback will directly influence the next steps of deeepSpace’s evolution.


How It Works:


1.Design your system in Figma.

2.Use the suuuuper fast deeepSpace Plugin (Beta) to push it to your workspace.

3.Generate and pull production-ready code with the deeepCLI.


Effortlessly manage your design system and projects through the deeepSpace web interface. Collaborate, track progress, and keep everything organized in one place.


Join our beta and help build scalable products faster than ever with deeepSpace! 🎉
plugins.tagline: “deeepSpace Figma Plugin – Supercharge Your Design System to Code Workflow, Faster Than Ever! 🚀”

plugins.name: Iconify  - Iconoir Icons Library
plugins.description:
🎨 Iconoir Icons – Iconify Library brings the full Iconoir icon set — one of the largest open-source icon collections — right into your Figma workflow. Whether you're working on dashboards, mobile apps, or sleek landing pages, Iconoir’s minimal and modern design fits perfectly into any project. 🖼️📱


This plugin, powered by Iconify, lets you search, preview, and insert icons effortlessly, without ever leaving Figma. No downloading, no importing SVGs manually — just clean, scalable icons ready to drop into your canvas. ✨


💡 Key Features:


🧩 Full access to the Iconoir icon set (1,500+ icons)


🔍 Fast, intuitive search with real-time previews


⚡ One-click insert into your Figma design


🖌️ Customizable stroke width and color


🆓 100% free and open-source via Iconify


🔄 Always up to date with the latest icons

plugins.name: Atomic Design Components
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with our AI-powered component generator. Simply describe what you want in natural language, and watch as professional, consistent UI components come to life instantly.


Key Features:

• Generate complete UI components using simple text prompts

• Built on atomic design principles for maximum reusability

• Support for buttons, forms, inputs, navigation, and more

• Customizable colors, sizes, states, and properties

• Responsive and design system ready

• Premium features including unlimited generations


Perfect for design teams, UI/UX designers, and anyone building professional interfaces. Start with our free trial and generate up to 20 components!


Contact & Support:


GitHub Issues: Report bugs or request features on GitHub.


Email Support: Reach out directly at alexanderburgosuk82@gmail.com.

accepted.name: uxuiconexioncreativa
accepted.description: With more than 7 years of experience in user-centered web design and front-end development, I specialize in building  solutions for business.
